alert.note: Alert for Oneida; Vilas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 8:09PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Isolated thunderstorm with heavy rainfall will impact portions of south central Vilas and far north central Oneida Counties through 900 PM CDT... At 809 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a slow moving thunderstorm with torrential rainfall near St. Germain. Movement of this storm was southeast at less than 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds to around 30 mph and torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... St. Germain through 830 PM CDT. Rainbow Flowage around 900 PM CDT. Due to the slow movement of the storm, some locations could receive over an inch of rain in a short period of time. Other locations that may be impacted by this storm include St Germain. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
